snippet: The Museum of the City of New York is preparing a major exhibition, opening in November, that spans the city’s four-century story of growth and transformation.
abstract: Museum of the City of New York prepares first permanent exhibition New York at Its Core, which aims to convey full scope of city's history and character and serve as gateway to temporary displays.
lead_paragraph: The Museum of the City of New York is preparing a major exhibition, opening in November, that spans the city’s four-century story of growth and transformation.

headline.main: What Made New York New York? Henry Hudson, George Washington and a Silver Subway Shovel
headline.print_headline: What Makes Up the City’s DNA

keywords.name: organizations
